title: Fuck. I Accidentally Gave My Name to the Fae and Now I’m Going to Experience Incomprehensible Horror.
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:writing-anomalies]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:pride-highlighter |inc-s9-nb-alt= --]]]

This is a little song written about SCP-4000 and the Fae! This was a fun project to record and I hope you enjoyed it. I wanted to create something that captured the whimsical yet eerie vibes that the Fae have in music form.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:audio-player-woed-source
|unique-name=secretparty
|audio-file= http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/cxaxukluths-sandbox/time%20to%20go%21.mp3
|background-color=rgb(252, 252, 252)
|border-color=rgb(215, 215, 215)
|border-radius=0.313rem
|dropshadow-color=rgba(12, 12, 12, 0.15)
|text-color=rgb(80, 0, 2)
|icons-color=rgb(171, 0, 5)
|player-color=rgb(215, 215, 215)
|progress-color=rgb(80, 0, 2)
]]

Here’s some more extras!

[[tab Lyrics]]

Sun
Forest
Sunset

Time to go
Time to go (Time to go)
Time to go (Time to go)
Time to go (Time to go)
Time to go (Time to go)
Time to go (Time to go)
Time to go (Time to go)
Time to go!

[[/tab]]
